name: TecnoballZ
overview: TecnoballZ is a “breaking blocks” game that was written for the Amiga platform. The aim is to break all the blocks in each level. The game is divided into Areas which are divided into Levels. Between some levels, you have to defeat a guardian to pass to the next level. When passing an Area, a new edge is open. You can buy weapons and bonuses between levels with the money earned during the game. TecnoballZ AGA is an adaptation of TecnoballZ for the Amiga 1200. The game has been adapted to take advantage of the Motorola 68020 microprocessor and the new AGA graphics chips.
